Name: Final Quest II
About the game: Final Quest II Return to the world of Paylea in Final Quest II. In an action-packed adventure, join Ralph and friends on an epic voyage to find his lost father. Have you got what it takes to confront the Dormai Empire? Your actions will define how the story evolves, multiple paths and choices will result in different endings. If you didn't play Final Quest that's OK. Final Quest II is a standalone game. For the best experience in FQII however, we do recommend playing the first game in the series. / Final Quest II Features: Return to the world of Paylea. Explore and adventure through a vast world with a variety of unique environments Find and recruit allies to your team Unlock hidden areas with secret passwords Recruit monsters to be your pets New treasure hunter system - Dig and find items New Pixel weather system Mini games Collect weapons, armours and secret key items.
